entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -18.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 03:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -18.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -21.2°C
Wind: N 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local amount 2 cm near the Rockies. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
